name: Heavenly Smite
description:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack, dealing 1d8 radiant damage on a hit. The target gains no benefit from cover for this attack.
The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).
